title: Error Code 003
body:
5:53pm 

RIot :)

UPDATE 6:04 


able to log in however unable to create a game lobby

UPDATE: 6:48 

FIXED

replies.body: I contacted the Rioters earlier to inform them of the situation when the issue presented and have now got confirmation from Riot Gehirn that they are aware of the issue and working towards a fix.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JElgLUkn,comment-id=00110002,timestamp=2018-11-09T09:30:13.672+0000)
>
> UPDATE: We are again getting reports of players receiving the 003 Error or patcher freezing from regions around the world. We're back on the case and I'll let you know when we have another update. Sit tight and maybe check out some [League of Origin](https://watch.na.lolesports.com/en_US/league-of-origin/en) while you wait.
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Thanks for the response Gehirn. Pretty crappy that we only hear from a Rioter after 5 hours of not being able to play. Maybe that’s just me being pissy though. I had trouble with my internet provider yesterday and finally got it fixed today. I was excited to continue using the K/DA Akali skin I bought when this crap happens.

Sorry about that. I didn't feel the need to make a post since Heartvine had already passed on that we were aware and the issue was seemingly resolved shortly after.

Even now, we're only getting a tiny trickle of reports from OCE as most are coming from EU. Have your logins been working fine over the last couple of hours or are you still having problems?

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JElgLUkn,comment-id=0011000200000000,timestamp=2018-11-09T10:01:24.114+0000)
>
> Sorry about that. I didn't feel the need to make a post since Heartvine had already passed on that we were aware and the issue was seemingly resolved shortly after.
> 
> Even now, we're only getting a tiny trickle of reports from OCE as most are coming from EU. Have your logins been working fine over the last couple of hours or are you still having problems?

I am still having problems logging in and my PBE account on the same device is also having the same problem. I am pretty sure my (OCE)client has somehow gone back a patch because when swap regions and swap back then sign in it doesn’t show the K/DA icons or skins. Also on the login page it doesn’t have the K/DA sound and animations

Uh woah that sounds a bit nuts. Can you please share a screenshot of your client front page after logging in? Also hit the settings cog in the top left and select "Third Party Licenses", this will tell you which patch you're on.

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JElgLUkn,comment-id=001100020000000000000000,timestamp=2018-11-09T10:22:54.963+0000)
>
> Uh woah that sounds a bit nuts. Can you please share a screenshot of your client front page after logging in? Also hit the settings cog in the top left and select "Third Party Licenses", this will tell you which patch you're on.

This is on my mac so take my issues with a grain of salt. I finally got my client to start redownloading after using the hextech tool on my Windows. It is version 8.20[[](https://i.imgur.com/sgHUswm.png)](https://i.imgur.com/Q9Aebea.png)
Thanks HeartVine, all fixed now

Haven't received word from the Rioters yet, so the issue *may* still be present. A few people have reported that the issue temporarily resolved only to reappear shortly after, so just keep an eye on it for now.

Thanks for posting

I really hope they can fix this soon.. Literally 4 days before the season ends and this happens on a Friday afternoon as I finish work :/

Yup! im getting the same thing as well.
Error Code 003 on my client. Apparently some of my friends got it yesterday.
My full repair doesn't work either, so it's got to be a problem with the servers.
Sad we get no responses from Riot about this when its clearly on their end
You're still here dude? Please unblock me lmao we on good terms
Why would I we ended on bad terms....
This still is broke.
Yep same, my installer is still only sitting at 0.0MB / 0.0 MB

I've just had this issue and have managed to resolve it.
I downloaded the Hextech tool for League of legends and forced a re-patch. This took me about 20 minutes and now it works sweet.
Windows Version: https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/player-support/tools/hextech-repair-tool/latest/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi 
Hopefully that helps!
Lush x
Mines still not working. Anyone having luck or know when Riot will fix this?
It worked for me now
Working fine for me now
Same for me, and I reinstalled for it. Now still stuck at 0.0 MB/ 0.0 MB after the restallation.
Same happened for me. Just leave that popup open and it will start eventually
can confirm servers are back

Fix for 003

First open task manager and close all instances of leagueclient

Second open C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects open all of the files and delete the Releases folder

Third C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config Open league client settings 

gameflow-patcher-lock: null delete this line and save the file

then go change your DNS Settings to 8 8 8 8 - 8 8 4 4

then close everything and try launching in admin

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
still waiting
It is working for me now, hopefully it will stay this way.
Really? still not working here
Mine was working again too but now its popping up with the error message again
yeah I had that problem too, I just left it alone and now it is letting me play and log in and everything. Hopefully it will fix for everyone soon.
Bump

i'm having the same issue as well, started randomly today while i was playing arams for missions, looks like getting to gold just got a lot harder if not impossible, sucks. i tried deleting files in releases folder, tried using the hextech repair tool, which does nothing but close itself after a short amount of time, so i uninstalled the game and reinstalled it, which at least allowed me to log into the client, but still can't play any games.
Me and all my friends are also getting it now.
Bump! Please fix!

And now I can get tot he lobby and my friend cant?!?
 {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Just getting it now, me and my friend! Unlucky!
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Same here.
Tried to re-install the game with the Hextech Repair Tool and now game hangs on a popup showing ETA 0 MINS - 0.0 MB / 0.0 MB
getting repair failed too
Im still getting it. Any ideas?

I am getting same issue as well.
Error code 003, can log in, but can't create an lobby
Had the same problem. How to fix this? Riot?
i think they just fixed it its letting me patch it.

This same thing happened about a month ago, was fixed within 2 hours.. Something to do with the patching system is interfering, they should be on top of it soon!

EDIT: Seems to be fixed now, at least it is for me!

I got this today as well....Not happy man </3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}


update: Let me login but then came up with the same error, closed client, reopened and its back to not letting me login again....
same here,
